typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_Comment} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_PostHistoryTypeId} as long,
		{_PostId} as long,
		{_RevisionGUID} as string,
		{_Text} as string,
		{_UserDisplayName} as string,
		{_UserId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPostHistory
source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
Sort1 aggregate(groupBy(PostHId),
	each(match(name!='PostHId'), $$ = toString(first($$)))) ~> Distinct
Select2 sort(desc(CreationDate, true)) ~> Sort1
Distinct, Select exists(PostHId == PostId && Text == PostContent,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
SrcPost select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_Id},
		PostContent = {_Body}
	)) ~> Select
SrcPostHistory select(mapColumn(
		PostHistoryId = {_Id},
		PostHId = {_PostId},
		RevisionGUID = {_RevisionGUID},
		Text = {_Text},
		UserDisplayName = {_UserDisplayName},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate}
	)) ~> Select2
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> DestHistoryDinstinctPost

source(output(
		{_AboutMe} as string,
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcUsers
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDimUser
SelectCleaningName, FilterOnlyLastRow join(Source_UserId == UserSk,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinDimUser
SrcDimUser filter(isNull(EndDate)) ~> FilterOnlyLastRow
DrvDateCols split(!isNull(UserId) && Source_Location != Location,
	disjoint: false) ~> CsRows@(SCD2Location, Upsert)
JoinDimUser derive(NewStartDate = currentUTC(),
		NewEndDate = currentUTC()) ~> DrvDateCols
CsRows@SCD2Location alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterUpdateOldRow
CsRows@Upsert alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterUpsert
SrcUsers select(mapColumn(
		Source_AboutMe = {_AboutMe},
		Source_AccountId = {_AccountId},
		Source_CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		Source_DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		Source_UserId = {_Id},
		Source_Location = {_Location}
	)) ~> SelectCleaningName
AlterUpdateOldRow sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UserId'],
	mapColumn(
		UserId,
		EndDate = NewEndDate
	)) ~> DestUpdateOldRows
AlterUpsert sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UserSk'],
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = Source_UserId,
		AccountId = Source_AccountId,
		DisplayName = Source_DisplayName,
		Location = Source_Location,
		StartDate = NewStartDate
	)) ~> DestUpsert
CsRows@SCD2Location sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = Source_UserId,
		AccountId = Source_AccountId,
		DisplayName = Source_DisplayName,
		Location = Source_Location,
		StartDate = NewStartDate
	)) ~> DestNewHistoricalRow

source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
UnpivotTags aggregate(groupBy(TagValue),
	Count = count(PostId)) ~> AggrTags
SelectPost derive(TagName1 = regexExtract(TagList, '(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?',1),
		TagName2 = regexExtract(TagList, '(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?',2),
		TagName3 = regexExtract(TagList, '(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?',3),
		TagName4 = regexExtract(TagList, '(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?',4),
		TagName5 = regexExtract(TagList, '(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?(<[\\S]*?>)?',5)) ~> DrvUnknown
SrcPost select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_Id},
		LastActivityDate = {_LastActivityDate},
		TagList = {_Tags}
	)) ~> SelectPost
DrvUnknown unpivot(output(
		TagName as string,
		TagValue as string
	),
	ungroupBy(PostId,
		LastActivityDate,
		TagList),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> UnpivotTags
AggrTags sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true) ~> DestPostsByTags

source(output(
		{_Comment} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_PostHistoryTypeId} as long,
		{_PostId} as long,
		{_RevisionGUID} as string,
		{_Text} as string,
		{_UserDisplayName} as string,
		{_UserId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPostHistoryByUsers
source(output(
		{_AboutMe} as string,
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcUsers
source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
SelectPostHistory, SelectUser join(SelectPostHistory@UserId == SelectUser@UserId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinPostsUsers
JoinPostsUsers aggregate(groupBy(UserDisplayName = {DisplayName},
		PostId),
	NbEdition = count(RevisionGUID)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 window(desc(NbEdition, true),
	RK = denseRank(NbEdition)) ~> Window1
SrcPostHistoryByUsers filter(!isNull({_UserId})) ~> FilterPostWithoutUser
Window1, SelectPost join(Aggregate1@PostId == SelectPost@PostId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinPostHistoryPost
Select1 filter(RK <= 100) ~> FilterTop100
SrcUsers select(mapColumn(
		DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		UserId = {_Id},
		LastAccessDate = {_LastAccessDate},
		Location = {_Location},
		Reputation = {_Reputation}
	)) ~> SelectUser
FilterPostWithoutUser select(mapColumn(
		Comment = {_Comment},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		PostHisoryId = {_Id},
		PostId = {_PostId},
		RevisionGUID = {_RevisionGUID},
		Text = {_Text},
		UserId = {_UserId}
	)) ~> SelectPostHistory
SrcPost select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_Id},
		Score = {_Score},
		Tags = {_Tags},
		Title = {_Title},
		ViewCount = {_ViewCount}
	)) ~> SelectPost
JoinPostHistoryPost select(mapColumn(
		UserDisplayName,
		NbEdition,
		RK,
		PostId = SelectPost@PostId,
		Score,
		Tags,
		Title,
		ViewCount
	)) ~> Select1
FilterTop100 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true) ~> DestTop100UpdatedPosts
